Any unwanted meat!

(google map) (yahoo map)

Hi! I am looking for any meat (preferably frozen) that you no longer want! I am interested in anything uncooked and not seasoned!
(This includes beef, chicken, duck, wild game, fish, organs, turkey, pork, etc) freezer burned is totally fine! This is for my dog-who has to eat a home-made diet.
I can come pick it up from your house, or a public location.. I will even unload it from your freezer if you'd prefer!

Thanks so much!
